SELECT ACTION_CODE_ID, ACTION_CODE_NAME, ACTION_CODE_TEXT,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_ACTION_CODE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_ACTION_CODE( ACTION_CODE_NAME , ACTION_CODE_TEXT , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :ACTION_CODE_NAME , :ACTION_CODE_TEXT , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_ACTION_CODE SET ACTION_CODE_NAME = :ACTION_CODE_NAME , ACTION_CODE_TEXT = :ACTION_CODE_TEXT , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE ACTION_CODE_ID = :ACTION_CODE_ID
